note.p: Career: Travelled through Europe to learn various ways of treating diseases of the eye; Groom of the Chamber and Oculist to James II; followed James into exile in France (1688); Surgeon to the Hospice des Quinze-Vingts, Paris; had a large practice in Paris; returned to England, where he practised little
Memberships: Berlin Academy; Noble Institute of Bologna [?Istituto delle Scienze e Arti]; Academia Curiosorum Naturae
